physDesc.p: Fragments 1-17 (in mm), (1) 23 x 45, (A) 5 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (2) 71 x 25, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 50 x 22, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 7 lines, no margins, (4) 67 x 36, (A) 2 lines, top right bottom (?) margins, (B) blank, (5) 71 x 31, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (6) 43 x 16, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 40 x 25, (A) 3 lines, top margin (?), (B) blank, (8) 48 x 17 , (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 39 x 20, (A) 6 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (10) 23 x 13, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (11) 38 x 16, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 19 x 30, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 43 x 19, (A) 4 lines (?), top right margins, (B) blank, (14) 45 x 29, (A) 5 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (15) 43 x 50, (A) 2 lines bottom margin, (B) 4 lines, top margin, (16) 39 x 31, (A) 3 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (17), 111 x 67, (A) 5 lines (?), right margin, (B) 2 lines, margins (?)
